refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function is used to register and persist an existing key in the Virtuoso server. This is needs to be made once per key/certificate, and does not need to be repeated after server restart, unless the key is erased and has to be redefined.

refsect2.title: key_name
refsect2.para: The key reference, as a 'Sample Key' or 'file:keys/srv.pem'

refsect2.title: key_value
refsect2.para: When the key is an internal reference i.e. non 'file:', the content of a key. The default value is NULL.

refsect2.title: key_type
refsect2.para: The key algorithm, possible values are "3DES", "RSA", "DSA", "X.509", "AES".

refsect2.title: key_format
refsect2.para: The format of the key content storage, possible values are "DER", "PEM", "PKCS12".

refsect2.title: key_passwd
refsect2.para: The password for opening the key if required, this can be NULL to indicate no password required.

refsect2.title: key_pkey
refsect2.para: When an X.509 certificate is imported, this can be supplied to load the corresponding private key also. This is optional. Note that when the PKCS#12 format is used to import an X.509 certificate, the private key is in the 'key_value', hence this parameter in such case must be omitted.
